  • Uses of Token in gameComponents

    Fields in gameComponents declared as Token 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static Token[][] Board.gameBoard
    gameBoard is a matrix of token, so a Token object can be inserted in it.
    private Token Player.token  
    Methods in gameComponents that return Token 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Token Player.getToken()
    Basic getter method for token field
    Token Board.getTokenInPosition​(int i, int j)
    Method that returns the token in position i, j of the matrix
    Methods in gameComponents with parameters of type Token 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Board.insert​(Token token, int column)
    Method for inserting a token in a given column In order to control if the move is allowed, it controls if the column where the player wants to insert the token in is full or not.
    void Match.insertInBoard​(Token token, int column)
    Method for inserting a token in a given column in the gameBoard of the match.
    void Player.setToken​(Token token)
    Basic setter method for token field
